game_description: Explore a giant world made of blocks and modify it with your own creations. Construct houses, build entire villages, cities, monumental constructions or dig deep underground. Place torches or design complex electric circuits to light up your creations in the dark and enjoy beautiful day and night cycles. â€¢ Creative sandbox block-building experience: Create your own worlds with more than 215 unique materials. â€¢ Jump into Virtual Reality and experience your block world as if you were there with incredible 360 degrees immersion. â€¢ Inking system: Customize the blocks with 16 different colors for your own look. â€¢ Multiplayer: Play together with 4 friends online. â€¢ Build-In World Gallery: Share you creations with the community or Download and Rate other players worlds easily with the built-in online world gallery. â€¢ Easy accessibility, Simple controls
Languages: English, French (France), German, Italian, Portuguese (Portugal), Spanish (Spain)
review_1: Please add survivor mode it would have way more people and there isnâ€™t enough buildings surviving game and it would be a blast to be marking a lot of money for this game or make it free if u donâ€™t want to update
review_2: TL,DR: a better version of the original, definitely worth the $10. I remember getting the app for the first time on the wii u. I remember loving it, because it was like a better version on minecraft. Sure, it doesn't have as many animals as minecraft, but it makes up for it with the materials it gives you, including the ability to do custom lighting and the ability to change colors of diffrent block. I didn't think they could make it better, but they somehow did. They made it possible to play in vr and gave some extra blocks to go with it. Keep making the game as good as it is now.
